name: The Clockwise Rocket
description:
The Clockwise Rocket!

You are an astronaut who's rocket has been damaged by an asteroid in the depths of space. Your ship is spinning wildly, but you realize you still have main thrust. You'll have to time the firing of your engine with the spinning of your rocket just right to navigate through the debris and asteroids that litter the path to your home station.

Fly safe out there, your ship can't survive another hit!
